operations.summary: Gets the SP Default URLs. These are Values that affect the user's experience when executing SP-initiated SSO operations.

responseMessages.message: PingFederate does not have its SP role enabled. Operation not available.

operations.summary: Update the SP Default URLs. Enter values that affect the user's experience when executing SP-initiated SSO operations.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Configuration for the IDP Default URL settings.

ssoSuccessUrl.description: Provide the default URL you would like to send the user to when Single Sign On (SSO) has succeeded.

confirmSlo.description: Determines whether the user is prompted to confirm Single Logout (SLO). The default is false.

sloSuccessUrl.description: Provide the default URL you would like to send the user to when Single Logout (SLO) has succeeded.
